channel.title: AMS Council Agenda Feed
channel.description: A feed that parses the agendas for AMS Council

item.title: Council Agenda – April 26, 2025
item.content:encoded:
AMS Council - April 26, 2025

Alma Mater Society of UBC Vancouver

Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 6:00 PM PDT to Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 10:00 PM PDT

Michael Kingsmill Forum + Zoom for Councillors (must be pre-arranged with the President): https://ubc.zoom.us/j/61361551422?pwd=WDhIblhkNEVEcFIyT1lsMjhBc0tSQT09

Meeting Details: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/61361551422?pwd=WDhIblhkNEVEcFIyT1lsMjhBc0tSQT09

Agenda

I. Call to Order 6:00 PM

II. Territorial Acknowledgement 6:10 PM

III. Approval of the Agenda

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be adopted as presented."

IV. Membership and Attendance: Introductions, New Members, Declaration of Vacancies6:12 PM

A. New Members

B. Vacancies

GSS, Medicine

C. Goodbyes

V. Speaker's Business and Remarks 6:13 PM

VI. Statements from Students-at-Large 6:18 PM

Statement from student-at-large - 3 minutes

Response from Councillors - 3 minutes

Closing remarks from student-at-large - 1 minute

Up to three students at large may address Council.

VII. Approval of Minutes of Council and Committees

BE IT RESOLVED THAT the following minutes be accepted as presented:

VIII. Consent Items

A. Consent Items Requiring a Simple Majority

B. Consent Items Requiring a Two-Thirds Majority

Motion to suspend AMS Code Section III Article 1. (4)

IX. Presentations and Accompanying Motions

A. 2024/25 AMS Executive Goals

B. Code Changes April 26th 2025

X. Executive and Committee Motions

A. Policy Changes 2025: Policy PC1

From the Executive Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Policy PC-1 on a Respectful Community and Workplace in accordance with the report entitled '2025_HR PC1 Review' as presented."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

B. Policy Changes 2025: Policy PC2

From the Executive Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Policy PC-2 on a Respectful Community and Workplace in accordance with the report entitled '2025_HR PC2 Review' as presented."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

C. Policy Changes 2025: Policy PC4

From the Executive Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Policy PC-4 on Prizes and Awards in accordance with the report entitled 'PC4 - Prizes and Awards' as presented."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

D. Code Changes 2025: Section 1 GENERAL

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Code in accordance with the report entitled 'Code Change 2025 Section 1 - General' effective May 1st"

Note: Requires 2/3rds

E. Code Changes 2025: Section 5 COMMITTEES

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Code in accordance with the report entitled 'Code Change 5 - Committees' effective May 1st"

Note: Requires 2/3rds

F. Code Changes 2025: Section 9a ELECTORAL PROCEDURES

G. Code Changes 2025: Section 9b FISCAL PROCEDURES

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Code in accordance with the report entitled 'Code Change 2025 9b - Fiscal Procedures' effective May 1st"

Note: Requires 2/3rds

H. Code Changes 2025: Section 9c PERSONNEL PROCEDURES

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Code in accordance with the report entitled '09c - Personnel Procedures Code 2025' effective May 1st"

Note: Requires 2/3rds

I. Code Changes 2025: Section 10 SERVICES

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Code in accordance with the report entitled 'Code Change 2025 Section 10 - Services' effective May 1st"

Note: Requires 2/3rds

J. Code Changes 2025: Section 14 PRESIDENTS COUNCIL

K. Code & Policy Changes 2025: Misc. Changes

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council amend Policy BU1, CM5, PC7, SR4, CM3, and FN3 in accordance with the report entitled 'Policy Changes 2025 - Misc. Committee Changes.' effective May 1st"

"BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT" none of these changes be considered reviews of the Policies"

"BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT Council amend Code in accordance with the report entitled "Code Change 2025 - Misc. Changes" effective May 1st"

"BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT Code be amended such that all Table of Contents and Page Numbers are accurate once all changes have been applied"

"BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT Code and Policies be amended such that all references to Section V: Committees of Council are accurate once all changes have been applied"

Note: Requires 2/3rds

L. Preliminary Budget FY 2025/2026

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

From the Finance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council approve the preliminary budget for the Society for the fiscal year starting May 1, 2025 and ending April 30, 2026, as presented."

XI. Constituency and Affiliate Motions

XII. Discussions and Consultation

XIII. President's Business and Remarks 6:39 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 5 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XIV. Executive Business and Remarks

A. VP Academic & University Affairs 6:44 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. VP Administration 6:47 PM

Presenter: Amy Liao (she/her/hers)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. VP External Affairs 6:50 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. VP Finance 6:53 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. VP Student Life 6:56 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Managing Director 6:59 PM

Presenter: Justin Lieu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Senior Manager Student Services 7:02 PM

Presenter: Kathleen Simpson

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XV. Committee Reports (3 minutes each)

A. Advocacy Committee 7:05 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. Finance Committee 7:08 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. Operations Committee 7:11 PM

Presenter: Amy Liao (she/her/hers)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. Governance Committee 7:14 PM

Presenter: Eshana Bhangu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Human Resources Committee 7:17 PM

Presenter: Cameron Taylor

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Student Life Committee 7:20 PM

Presenter: Cameron Taylor

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Executive Performance and Accountability Committee (EPA) 7:23 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

H. Advisory Board 7:26 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVI. Report from Presidents' Council 7:29 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVII. Board of Governors, Senate, & Ombudsperson Reports

A. Board of Governors

Presenters: Eshana Bhangu, Kamil Kanji

B. Senate

Presenters: Jasper Lorien, Jacky Xue

C. Ombudsperson

XVIII. Historical Update 7:32 PM

Presenter: Sheldon Goldfarb

XIX. Other Business, Including In Camera Discussions, Notices of Motions and Submissions

XX. Next Meeting and Adjournment

Next Council meeting time and date: 6:00 pm on May 7, 2025.

Supporting Documents
